alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:30AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wicomico and Dorchester Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 730 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Flag Harbor, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Taylors Island around 740 AM EDT. Cambridge and University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies around 755 AM EDT. Secretary around 805 AM EDT. Hurlock around 815 AM EDT. Federalsburg around 820 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Galestown, Madison, Brookview, Eldorado, Hudson, Church Creek, Lloyds, Mardela Springs, Taylors Island and Woolford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
